channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Bryan Kohberger gets life in prison but leaves loved ones of Idaho students he killed wondering why
item.description: A judge has ordered Bryan Kohberger to serve life in prison without parole for killing four University of Idaho students.
